attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Death penalty for child murders and child rapists who have been caught by DNA or have been 100% convicted.We need to protect our children from these real life monsters.

rejection.details:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/life-for-a-life/

The title of your petition must be a request for an action, not simply your name.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
